title: Intermarché-Circus-Wanty Kicks Rider Out of Tour of Guangxi for Racist Gesture
content:
Madis Mihkels will not race after a video on social media showed him making the offending gesture. Gerben Thijssen has also been dropped after posting the video.

Read the full article at Intermarché-Circus-Wanty Kicks Rider Out of Tour of Guangxi for Racist Gesture on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
